bundle.shortDescription: The intuitive GUI for your Docker containers
bundle.longDescription: Docsee revolutionizes Docker management with its sleek, user-friendly interface. Visualize your containers, manage images, and monitor performance with unprecedented clarity. Designed for developers who want the power of Docker without the command-line complexity, Docsee brings container management into the modern age with real-time metrics, one-click operations, and intelligent organization tools. Perfect for both Docker beginners and seasoned professionals looking to streamline their workflow.
